name: Candygirl story
description:
Over 120 action packed sweet candy matching levels with hidden treasures and
sweet stories of match candy dreams are waiting around the corner just to be explored!

Explosive fun for all ages to play and this is a great way to enlighen your day!
Swipe to match the candies, get 3 or more in a row to crunch them and earn points.
Different tasks to complete, different missions to encounter and endless fun while doing it!

Candygirl story is truly an amazing game to have in any device at any time.
Perfect casual puzzle game when and wherever you are.

Super addictive and one of the worlds most beloved gameplay and the best part of it all is that you can download the game for free!

Grab the best bargain of your life, download Candygirl story!
